Notification.name: ApplicationMovedToTrash
Notification.Title: You have moved {AppName,14} to the Trash
Notification.Message: Would you like to launch {MainProductName} to delete the leftovers?

Notification.name: DailyDiscountOffer
Notification.Title: 94% discount for your Mac
Notification.Message: Speed up your Mac now by fixing all system issues.

Notification.name: FirstStartNoAction
Notification.Title: System is ready for scan
Notification.Message: Press "Start scan" button to run system scan.

Notification.name: MinorFunnelScanFinishedNoAction
Notification.Title: System notification
Notification.Message: Please consider cleaning your Mac from junk files.

Notification.name: ScanFinishIssueCount
Notification.Title: System status: {IssueCount} issues found
Notification.Message: Press "Fix issues" to fix all system errors.

Notification.name: ScanFinishStatusCritical
Notification.Title: Your system status is critical
Notification.Message: {IssueCount} issues found. Press "Fix issues" to fix all system errors.

Notification.name: SeveralApplicationsMovedToTrash
Notification.Title: You have moved {AppCount} apps to the Trash
Notification.Message: Would you like to launch {MainProductName} to delete the leftovers?

Notification.name: TrialCleanFinishFix
Notification.Title: {IssueCount} issues left. Show details and continue fix.
Notification.Message: Press "Fix issues" to fix all system errors.
